summary: Action required: update cluster Workload Identity Federation (WIF) configuration
description: Red Hat SRE has updated the required permissions for Workload Identity Federation (WIF) clusters. Please follow the documentation: https://docs.openshift.com/dedicated/osd_gcp_clusters/creating-a-gcp-cluster-with-workload-identity-federation.html#wif-configuration-update_osd-creating-a-cluster-on-gcp-with-workload-identity-federation. Apply the new changes to your Workload Identity Federation (WIF) configuration with the command 'ocm gcp update wif-config'.
